titleStmt.title: SII 14.152: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 152. (A.R. No. 712 of 1916.) ŚĒRMĀDĒVI, AMBASAMUDRAM TALUK, TIRUNELVELI DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE maṇḍapa IN FRONT OF A SHRINE, RĀMASVĀMIN TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription which is damaged at several places, is dated in the 14th year of Sundara-Chōḷapāṇḍya and registers a gift of land made by the sabhā of Nigariliśōḻachaturvēdimaṅgalam for providing certain offerings to the image of god Uyyakkoṇḍāḻvār in the temple of Nigariliśōḷa-viṇṇagar.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . koccaṭaiyapaṉmarāṉa śrīcuntaracoḻapāṇṭiyatevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 4Āvatu rājarājappāṇṭināṭṭu Uttamacoḻavaḷanāṭṭu muḷḷināṭṭu brahmadeśam nikarilicoḻa śaThe inscription is much damaged and built in at right end.
bhaiyom nam nikarilicoḻaviṇṇakar Eḻuntaruḷi niṟkkum Ūyakkoṇṭāḻ ṭaikku Ivvāṭṭai nāḷ muṉṉūṟṟu Irupatumutal tiruvamutukku potu nāṉāḻiyāka muṉṟu cantikku māka Arici kuṟuṇi nāṉāḻikku Iraṇṭāñ cākki �
m neyamitu nittam ney Uḻakkum kaṟi Amitukkum Aṭaikkāy Amitukkum Āka nel kuṟuṇi Aṟunāḻiyum Āka nelThe inscription is much damaged and built in at right end.
Digital edition of SII 14.152 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
